overview: Twitter, TechCrunch, Google, Buzz, Facebook, DIGG - you all know me better than I know myself. Could you fil in third-party info. I fix broken companies or redirect one’s headed for trouble. I also create businesses from an idea, I am a visionary of at least 2 yrs. LinkedIn Q&A for Kitty Kelso will show you that I was looking for a fleet of ships to start global inclusion of smaller countries. Nobody knew what I was talking about. It happens often. I won $20M Angel Network Award (to date money is stuck somewhere). I was just named National Association of Professional Women for the year 2011. If you need more info, ask me…kk
